mapper.select: select v.vctn_num, v.emp_num, e.emp_name, to_char(v.vctn_start_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI') as startdate, to_char(v.vctn_end_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI') as enddate, v.vctn_type_num, vt.vctn_name, vt.vctn_time, vt.deduction_day, v.vctn_reason, vt.vctn_time*to_number(floor(trunc(v.vctn_end_date,'MI')-trunc(v.vctn_start_date,'MI'))) as totaltime, -- 총 유급시간 vt.deduction_day*to_number(floor(trunc(v.vctn_end_date,'MI')-trunc(v.vctn_start_date,'MI'))) as totalday -- 총 차감일수 from vacation v inner join emp e on v.emp_num = e.emp_num inner join vacation_type vt on v.vctn_type_num = vt.vctn_type_num order by v.vctn_num
